title: Gross Class Zero
description: The kids in Miss Clutterbuck’s class zero are supersnotic, bogeytastic, burpalicious, megafarty, and zitcredible! They’re zeros coming out to play. They’re heroes not just for one day!
quote: Snot, bogey, fart, zit goo! We’re all gross and so are you!
alt1: Burping Belinda with smelly waves coming out of her mouth
alt2: Zack Zitface squeezing a zit and purple goo is shooting out
alt3: Evil Emperor with Drusilla and Damian,
alt4: Bogey Barbara next to a fart cloud
